title:
Stochastic-periodic homogenization of Poisson-Nernst-Planck equations in
  porous media
authors:
Franck Tchinda, Joel Fotso Tachago, Joseph Dongho, and Fridolin
  Tchangnwa Nya
abstract:
This paper is devoted to the study of the stochastic-periodic homogenization
of Poisson-Nernst-Planck equations in porous media. It is shown by the
stochastic two-scale convergence method extended to periodic surfaces that
results in a global homogenized problem having suitable coefficients.
